name: real-time-qna-chat
description: Simple model using express and ws server  Intended for following tasks  - Allow admin(teacher) to create a new chat room and set properties on the room - Allow users to join and send messages - Allow users to upvote chat message (message like doubt during teaching session) - If message reaches ome x no of upvotes move them to queue of questions - - if message reaches more that around 15 votes direclty send the question to the admin (teacher)to answer
